caption: A boy is lying in bed, and his mother is trying to put him to sleep. The next morning, the mother takes out a bag from the closet. A man in black clothes is sitting in a chair with his feet up on the desk, talking to someone across from him. Both of them leave the building and head to the street. A woman is packing her luggage at home, while at the same time, a man is making a phone call. After a brief conversation with the man, the woman grabs her bag and leaves the house. The man follows her into the hallway, but the door slowly closes, and he returns to the empty home.
